pages.text: Some of these planets are lush jungles, some are marshes, others are mountainous. But they all hold the same unique resources.$(br2)Another common trait they all share is that they're wonderful to look at compared to the red dust or endless snow of other planets

You could set up massive industries here, you could harvest the trees or the resources below, you could even farm the wildlife if you wanted to. Another possibility is setting up a holiday resort for people to visit if that's your kind of thing, claiming one of these places as your home seems like a much better idea for those who care about looks.
